description:
- "Those pop idols were amazing. I couldn`t stop looking at them..." -
D`Artagnyan goes about her everyday life until she makes a trip to Tokyo.
There, she spots Lucy singing alone in the moonlight. Unable to forget the incredible sight,
D`Artagnyan`s friend Izumo invites her to see a concert featuring the popular Angelic Divas.
Little did she know, that experience would completely change D`Artagnyan`s life!
